attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is extremely important for leaders of the three main parties to ensure their parties are run fairly and considerately.
This means total respect for gender, sex and personal characteristics.
It is totally wrong for any one to be victimised because of their differences.
It is also wrong for a person with power over another to make the employee's life miserable.
If the employee cannot understand instructions they should be re-phrased.
If the fault lies with the personal characteristics of the bully he or she should be sent for counselling and treatment to improve his or her behaviour.
